videos.name: DIY NECKLACE HEADBANDS
videos.description:
DIY Necklace Headbands 

What You Need: 
Necklaces or Belts  
Scissors  
Clear Nail Polish  
Ruler  
Pliers  
Needle and Thread 

For an easy how-to on these DIY Necklace Headbands check out my BLOG http://www.foreveryoursbeauty.com/DIY...

Thanks for watching ! Please send me pictures on my Facebook or Twiter if you ever create your own DIY Necklace Headbands or re-create any of my other tutorials :D I would love to see xoxo Talk to you all very soon !

videos.name: The Messy Side Braid
videos.description: This is a how to tutorial of the Messy Side Braid. This is a bit different then the regular three strand braid. Instead, we first braid the middle strand and mess it up for more volume. Then begin regularly braiding with the three strands, using the middle braid as the middle strand. Tie off the braid with an elastic and mess it up for even more volume. Hope you like it ! Thanks for watching and don't forget to subscribe to my channel :)

videos.name: DIY Chain Head Bands
videos.description: This is a DIY (Do It Yourself) hair tutorial. I show you how to create a fun and creative chain hair band. I saw a beautiful picture on pinterest of a girl with blonde hair sporting this lovely hair accessory. After finally figuring out how to make one myself, I thought it would be fun to share it with you ! As always, let me know any requests you have for new videos in the comment section below. This video took a super long time to create, film, and edit ! Please like the video for more DIY :) ! Thanks so much for watching :)

videos.name: Romantic Ringlet Curls Hair Style
videos.description: This look was actually requested by you guys ! I wore my hair just like this in my recent video called Back to School Makeup Look. I got so many sweet comments asking me to redo it as a tutorial- so here we go :) ! First off, if you have curly hair- perfect ! You can skip the curling hair part. If you have wavy/straight hair, I totally suggest using the conair infiniti clipless curling wand that I used. I would highly recommend investing in it (about $30 from walmart/target/beautystores). I bought mine about a year ago and use it all the time. It turns straight hair into super curly ringlets. And I use it on my naturally curly hair too when I need a little more spring/bounce.

videos.name: No Heat Curls Hair Tutorial for All Hair Types
videos.description: Hello again my lovely friends ! I am happy to say that as of tomarrow I will get back into recording videos more frequently. So look forward to lots of new videos from me ! As always, you can like my Facebook Page to send me inspirational pictures or requests for new videos. I hope you all enjoy this no heat hair tutorial for all hair types. If you weren't able to completely follow, I will be posting on my blog shortly a nice instructional for you to reference to ! Thanks again for watching :) Love you guys. Thanks for staying strong and positive !

videos.name: Taylor Swift Hair Tutorial (Curly Hair)
videos.description:
Sorry for the brightness ! I recorded in the afternoon and it was super sunny that day lol Hope you guys don't mind and still enjoy it :) If you decide to give it a try I would love to see pictures, send them to me on my Twitter or Facebook ! My DIY Sea Salt Spray video will be up soon, I promise!

Thanks for watching !

videos.name: DIY Sea Salt Spray for Beachy Waves and Curls
videos.description:
Hey guys !! In this video I show you how I like to make my DIY sea salt spray. I love using this in the summer especially because it has such a wonderful coconut scent ! If you have naturally curly hair like me, you will have beachy curls as the end result. If you have naturally straight or wavy hair you should have nice beachy waves after using a spray like this ! Try it out and let me know how it works for you! :) Good luck !

Products Used:
 >> Sea Salt, Cocounut Oil & Bottle from Target
 >> DevaCurl Hair Gel from a salon

videos.name: DIY Holiday Headband + Voluminous Curls with Bouffant Half Up Hairstyle
videos.description: Hey guys! I'm so excited to share one of many Holiday Hair Tutorials that I have planned for this season =) I was really inspired by the 60s with this look: Big voluminous curls, a bouffant/poof, and an easy DIY Holiday Headband! A big thanks to TRESemme who chose this hairstyle to be in their Throwback Thursdays Series! Join us on Instagram by recreating this hairstyle on yourself and using the hashtag #TRESthrowback and #TBT Thanks for watching love you guys! Xoxo

videos.name: Cute Twist & Braid Hair Style
videos.description: This is a simple, cute, everyday hairstyle that involves a few braids and twists ! This is a request from a subscriber on twitter ! She asked to replicate Emily Maynard's hair from a previous episode of the Bachelorette. If you want to request any hair or makeup tutorials, feel free to drop my facebook or twitter pages and let me know ! Thanks for watching ! :)

videos.name: DIY Sock Bun Hairstyle
videos.description:
I thought this look would be perfect for back to school. It is a do it yourself (DIY) hair tutorial on how to create the perfect bun. I hope you all enjoy this and try it out yourself ! Thanks for watching :)

perfect bun hair tutorial style how to demonstration back school DIY do it yourself sock foreveryours0727 foreveryoursbeauty elegant updo messy teen sock hairstyle

videos.name: SIMPLE UPDO FOR CURLY HAIR
videos.description: This video is for all my curly haired gals ! Hope you enjoy this simple and easy updo for curly hair ! More curly hair tutorials coming soon :) xoxo

videos.name: Easy Updo with a Pencil !!
videos.description:
Twisted Messy Updo Hairstyle Using Pencil

This is a super quick, easy way to get your hair up ! You only need a pencil to twist your hair up into a loose updo. I have some short layers that stick out (from my new haircut!), which adds to the undone-ness effect. I used to do this all the time in college ! It's perfect for when you forget elastics, rubberbands, or bobbypins ! This may only work on medium to thin hair like mine but give it a try anyways and let me know :)

videos.name: DIY Beaded Braid Hair Style
videos.description:
DIY Beaded Braid

Hi guys ! I wanted to take a simple side braid hairstyle and add a little fun to it. I tried a few different ways to do this beaded look. When I braided the pearls into my hair (by combining it into a strand of hair), you couldn't even see the pearls. As I braided it, the pearls got lost in the hair. So I'm really happy with the way it turned out using my technique. One being because I only needed to use one hair elastic. And two being that my braid looked more loose, which I like :) Hope you like this hair style and try it out for yourselves !

videos.name: No HEAT, No TEASING Curled Side PonyTail Hair Tutorial !!
videos.description:
Hey everyone !
This is a side pony tail hair tutorial with curled (or naturally curly) hair. I use NO HEAT and NO TEASING ! :) Enjoy

videos.name: Glamorous Top Knot
videos.description: Hello again ! I am feeling super inspired lately... which means lots of new tutorials for all of you ! :) This one is a glamorous top knot inspired by a variety of different celebrities and runway models. I love this look because it is HEAT FREE ! I think it would look so perfect for dressed up occasions/events. Hope you like it, thanks for watching !

videos.name: Angel Wing Dutch Braid Bangs, Basic How To
videos.description: I have been seeing this look a lot lately- it's so perfect for spring/summer ! I posted a picture of me wearing it on my Instagram and a lot of you asked for a tutorial ! So here it is :) There a bunch of different ways to style this- I just wanted this video to be a basic how-to on the braid :) Hope you all like this video !! Thanks so much for watching :)

videos.name: Easy Messy Side Bun for the Holidays
videos.description: We only have a few days left before Thanksgiving ! This year I am going to spend it with my Mom, sister Brooke and younger brother. My family lives in different states all over the US so I am thankful that we get to be together for this upcoming holiday ! What are your plans for Thanksgiving ? :) As for this hair tutorial- I was thinking of not uploading it because its so simple. Hopefully you all enjoy it anyways ! Its a super easy, fun, effortless look to do that takes only a few minutes ! I have been wearing it a lot to classes because it takes little time to do and still looks cute ;) If anyone recreates this look- send me a pic on my FB !

videos.name: Curly Hair Ponytail in Under 4 Minutes
videos.description:
This is a simple tutorial showing my curly haired friends out there how to quickly get an elegant and everyday ponytail. Enjoy !

Here are the products I used in order :)
1. Tresemme Dry Shampoo to help with teasing/excess oil
2. Black Label Boar and Nylon Brush for teasing
3. Thin rubber band to hold the ponytail
4. Aveda Be Curly Serum to reshape curls
5. Big Sexy Hair Spray to hold curls and ponytail in place

videos.name: Chic Summer Bun Updo Hair Tutorial
videos.description: This is not a sponsored video. All opinions are 100% my own and honest ;)

videos.name: Looped Side Bun using Luxy Hair Extensions
videos.description: So it was HIGHLY requested by so many of my lovely subscribers to do a video using my Luxy Hair Extensions. If you have been subscribed to me for a while, you know that I posted a video a few months ago showing how to put the extensions in (it was my first time !) And i loved the way it looked. I have gotten lots of questions if these extensions are still working for me and if they are still in good quality. Yes ! They are ! These extensions are my favorite and I absolutely love the Luxy Sisters who sell them :) I was sponsored these extensions a year or so ago. I never got the chance to wear them more than 3 or 4 times because I kept dying my hair too dark :( So my hair finally matches now ! Im so excited for everyone to see this tutorial and I think you will all love it ! If you have your own hair extensions, definately try it out ! :) I will post more tutorials soon using these luxy hair extensions as well. Thanks for watching !!

videos.name: How To: Easy Romantic Curls Hair Tutorial
videos.description:
Hello again! I wanted to share with you how I curl my hair with extensions in! I used a bigger curling iron so I could get very loose and soft curls :) This would be a perfect look to wear for a glamorous event or even as an everyday hair style! Hope you like it and give it a try. Don't forget to comment below, give this video a thumbs up if you liked it, and SUBSCRIBE! :) xoxo
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
List of Products Used:

EuroNext Hair Extensions in Chesnut Brown 18'(Only used the four big three clip wefts)
Helen of Troy Curling Iron 1 & 1/2'
Suave Try Shampoo
Loreal Elnett Satin HairSpray
Denman D3 Brush

videos.name: Chachi Gonzales Hair Tutorial
videos.description: I am a huge fan of Chachi Gonzales. She is a beautiful, talented, and inspiring dancer from I Am Me crew (which won ABDC!). Part of her signature look is her curled hair with that heavy side bang. I wanted to recreate the look for you guys here in this video ! Hope you like my tutorial :) If you try it out- send me a picture on Twitter ! Are you a fan of Chachi too ? :) Let me know in the comment section below :) Until next timeeee xoxo
